alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Brevard County through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Merritt Island Wildlife Refuge to near Sharpes to Rockledge to near Camp Holly Fish Camp. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Titusville, Rockledge and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
